title: Was Erie County in Ben? Paul, Agent Prague, about the rejection of Trump's ballot papers?
subtitle: Donald Trump Jr. and others took over social media articles saying, "I've already thrown over 100 Trump ballots!"
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: On election day 2020, Erie County, Pennsylvania, the poll worker boasted of the rejection of more than 100 votes in favour of President Donald Trump of the United States.
